About.about1: I'm a university stundent with an interest in health tech, user interface and web development, machine learning, data science and artificial intelligence and would love an opportunity to use my skills in a relevant role.
About.about2: My interest in health tech and technology in general led me to study bioinformation technology as my bachelor's degree's major. Currently, I'm pursuing my master's degree in computer science with a major in Machine Learning, Data Science and Artificial intelligence.
About.about3: I'm passionate about continuous learning and developing new skills, as demonstrated by my enthusiasm for new opportunities when they arise. I consider myself to be highly adaptive and efficient learning individuaI. I have the ability to work with a variety of personalities and can easily read the room.
About.about4: Hope that you like my page and maybe I'll hear from you in the future!

junior.desc: Instructing and teaching at a Robotics program that aims to promote technology education for children and young pupils. Communicating with teachers about bookings. Other small tasks such as translating materials into English.

ge.desc: Collecting and delivering materials for the assembly of patient monitoring modules and monitors. Monitoring the quality of the materials used in the assembly.

lidl.desc: Collecting orders in the various storage areas of the distribution centre using a pallet truck. Maintaining the cleanliness of the premises and the tidiniess of the collection areas.
